page.title: 14PENTRECELYN PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: There are 4 teachers in the school.The name of the present Headmaster is Mr D H Roberts.Also on the staff, there is a Nursery Assistant,two dinner ladies, a school caretaker,one lady collecting dinner money, one part-time Secretary for the Headmaster and one lunch-time supervisor. There are 85 children on the school register and 11 children in the nursery class. In the main school building there are three large rooms with two used as class-rooms.One class-room is used as a hall and a dining-room.The staff-room and toilets are in the main building. On the school yard there is a mobile class-room and part of the house has been converted into a class-room.The school was opened in May 1874.
